# orion-label

Label is a component that displays a label for a form element. It is used to display labels in forms. Use in conjunction with the `orion-text-input` component and other form components.

Additional documentation available at [orion.united.com](https://orion.united.com/)

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description              | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Shows the disabled state | `boolean` | `false` |
| `error`    | `error`    | Shows the error state    | `boolean` | `false` |


## Slots

| Slot                        | Description                    |
| --------------------------- | ------------------------------ |
| `"default"`                 | default slot for label content |
| `"orion-label-conditional"` | slot for conditional text      |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                           | Description                              |
| ------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------- |
| `--orion-label--padding-right` | Padding right of the label. Default: 8px |
